entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the water in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the water in the evening. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
